      • isKerberosEnabled

        boolean isKerberosEnabled()
        Tests to see if Kerberos is enabled for this service using the Kerberos enabled test metadata and the existing cluster configurations.
        Returns:
        true. if it is determined that Kerberos is enabled for this service; false, otherwise
        See Also:
        isKerberosEnabled(Map)

      • isKerberosEnabled

        boolean isKerberosEnabled(Map<String,Map<String,String>> configurations)
        Tests to see if Kerberos is enabled for this service using the Kerberos enabled test metadata and the supplied configurations map.
        Parameters:
        configurations - a map of configurations to use for the test
        Returns:
        true. if it is determined that Kerberos is enabled for this service; false, otherwise
        See Also:
        isKerberosEnabled()
